author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: SF supervisors push for more gig worker protections during the coronavirus pandemic
description: San Francisco’s Board of Supervisors is pushing a number of legislative bodies to offer more protections and benefits for gig workers during COVID-19 pandemic. As gig workers are still out delivering food to people and providing rides, supervisors are asking …
